TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted you boil alive

i wish I knew hexadecimal coding

Edited February 24, 2015 by Ethanadams
granted, but you lose all fingers. I wish that lithobraking just stopped ships instead of blowing them up

Granted. Ships no longer explode, but crumple on impact.

I wish for some good video editing software.

Granted your anti virus attacks it

i wish to speak Latin

Granted. You can only speak pig Latin.

I wish for a hamburger

Granted. but it turns out to be a cheeseburger

I wish for the perfect computer

Granted. It becomes sentient and destroys humanity.

I wish for a computer that is good enough.

Granted but your graphics card burns out

I wish i could wish for a wish to not be corrupted

Granted. The wish is that it cant be corrupted, so its empty. Like a indestructible bottle, but you cant put anything in it.

I wish for Medival Engineers

You get sucked back in time into the middle of a battle. Have fun with the catapult!

I wish for infinite time.

Your prison sentence is infinite in length (not one of those silly 500 year deals).

I wish that the next posted wish goes uncorrupted.

Doubtful on every level.

But... I wish for my own planet, or moon.

Granted. toxic/lava/radiation. Death in 2 minutes.

I wish for infinite Steam Wallet credit

granted. you get infinite steam wallet,but steam just bans your account from doing so.

I wish for a spaceship thats just like the space shuttle.

Granted but it is put out of service

i wish for friends

Edited February 25, 2015 by Ethanadams

granted, they are in an alternate dimension(sorry. I will be)

I want the most delicious cake delivery service

Granted. Their delivery vehicles are made out of delicious cakes, but you have to pay a lot for the cakes they deliver. Even more to pay for those cars you just ate.

I wish for time dissolved in water.

Granted you drink it and become a fetus

i wish for an ipad

granted. but the universe is now broken, fracturing it far away from you

I wish for a pet rocket

edit: ninj'd

granted, but you get it broken in half

`

Edited January 17, 2021 by LVL 9001

Gran- SYNTAX ERROR

I wish for Bender.

Granted. You now own a child from the Bender family.

I wish for a chain made of soda tabs.

Granted. You accidentally drop it in chlorine trifluoride and watch as it burns away.

I wish I wasn't so gosh darn annoying.

Granted. Instead of simply being annoying, you become actively distasteful.

I wish I had an uncorrupted cake.

Granted. The cake is fine, but you hate the flavour.

I wish I could be friends with an Absol in real life! :3
